headline: Stablecoin or CBDC? Tether’s latest freeze adds fuel to decentralization debate
summary: Following its latest freeze of nearly $86K in stolen USDt, Tether’s enforcement capabilities are again in the spotlight — raising questions about centralized control in stablecoin ecosystems.

headline: Trump’s media company reports $2B in Bitcoin after crypto bills pass US House
summary: Backed by $2.5 billion in funding, Trump’s media company has started acquiring Bitcoin as part of its previously announced investment strategy.

headline: Bitcoin bull run 'likely close to over' says trader as XRP flips McDonald's
summary: Bitcoin price action leaves a lot to be desired as an XRP market cap milestone compounds trader excitement over a new "altseason."
